MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH43 postcode area of Walkerburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:12am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of adverse weather conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:53am on Friday, 04 December 2020
